content.rendered:
JEROME ST. BERNARD

Mortgage Agent

Level 2

  • 647.996.5154
  • jerome@vinegroup.ca
  • English
  • Toronto

Jerome brings to the lending world a strong business acumen and sales background honed across various industries. Jerome is equipped with the experience to guide you through the investing process. He has a strong passion for real estate investing and dedication to ensuring a rewarding customer experience. Drawn to the business by the satisfaction he gains from helping people accomplish their goals, Jerome guides his clients to make solid investments, their journey to financial freedom.

Jerome has one goal as a mortgage professional, and that is putting his clients first by providing valuable knowledge, guidance, and resources to help clients with their purchasing decisions. Before his career path in mortgage financing, Jerome received an NCAA D1 Track & Field Scholarship. He uses the same speed, focus, and sense of urgency to quickly and efficiently guide his clients through the mortgage process.

Homeownership can be intimidating, and Jerome is passionate about making this process more accessible to those who don’t realize their options. He understands the confusion and intricacy that mortgages entail and strives to inform and empower clients throughout the process. Jerome is committed to finding financing solutions for his clients and is equipped to overcome any obstacles that may arise.

Along with Vine Group, Jerome works hard at staying ahead of the competition to ensure that you save time and money. Most importantly, you will have peace of mind that you received the best mortgage solution.

Client Testimonials

'Jerome St. Bernard helped us with out mortgage for two consecutive years. He carefully listened to our needs and concerns. Our finances hit rock bottom and he helped us navigate how to access our home equity that helped our situation. He used his know-how for us to secure a mortgage this year with an A-lender and an excellent mortgage interest rate. Jerome, thank you very much. I feel so much better where we are at with our mortgage. My family sincerely appreciates your help. God bless you always.'
- Minerva G.
'Jerome St.Bernard handled my mortgage request excellently. From the beginning right through to the end and thereafter, he was professional and just amazing. He took care of my mortgage needs very smoothly, providing expert advice that helped me to understand and manage my expectations better. Jerome, you're the best! You were very prompt in responding to my needs, and for that, I say THANK YOU VERY VERY MUCH. You got me what I was looking for and guided me safely to the execution of my application. Kudos to you!'
- Adol W.
'It was a privilege working with Jerome, and I couldn't have asked for a better experience. Jerome brings a wealth of knowledge and dedication to the table, coupled with exceptional communication skills. His genuine care and personalized approach made the entire process seamless and enjoyable. I would wholeheartedly recommend his services to anyone seeking mortgage assistance.'
- Dane R.
'Jerome St.Bernard was awesome to work with, especially in a complex qualification situation. Jerome was prompt, professional, and well versed in all aspects of mortgages. Further, as I worked with Jerome over the course of a number of months during a period of stark economic change, he didn't hesitate to keep me apprised of current rates and trends, while demonstrating a high level of market understanding and reasonability when it came to finally choosing a mortgage product.'
- Tuomas M.
'We lucked out that Jerome took over our mortgage application. He was able to get us a better rate that what was being advertised. He had no problem with us shopping around other offers and simply told us to keep him informed because he might be able to match or better it, and that's exactly what happened. Constant updates and communication. We've found a new broker for life! Thanks Jerome!'
- Charmaine
'Jerome took the time to seek out multiple lenders, in multiple mortgage scenarios in order to ensure I was in the best possible borrowing position. Not even sure how he did it, but the rate he got me was much lower than what was offered to me initially by anyone/lending institution. Would definitely recommend his services if you want to get the best possible rate for your borrowing needs. I will definitely be working with Jerome in the near, and far future.'
-Jarrett
'As a first time home buyer, I'm very grateful to Jerome for all his help in securing a mortgage for me. He explained the process in a way that was easy to understand and always took the time to answer any questions I had. He is fantastic to work with. Appreciate all your help Jerome!'
- Duane
'Jerome absolutely exceeded my expectations. I spent years with RBC, never getting clear answers and often being spoken down to by their advisors. I was referred to Jerome and I'm amazed at the difference. He is patient, knowledgeable, helpful, and so much easier to wok with than RBC ever was. I can't recommend him enough.'
- Victoria
'Jerome was fantastic to work with and as a first-time home owner, I had a lot of questions throughout the process from the pre-approval through to closing. He was always available to speak to and put my mind at ease with such an unfamiliar and daunting process.'
- Sheereen
Previous slide
Next slide
